name: places/ChIJAZz-K75YwokRNOpPZqhw9uI
formattedAddress: 936 Broadway 2nd Fl, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 936 Broadway 2nd Fl, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text:
Deserving of less than zero stars if such a rating existed. This establishment shows an astounding level of ineptitude by allowing my ex (who I share legal and physical custody with) to enroll our minor child into counseling services, completely bypassing the necessity of my consent or knowledge. No contact attempted or even made with me. I only found out after my very young child told me she has been seeing someone at Ackerman and this was confirmed by my ex.

The audacity that it takes to permit a single parent to make such significant decisions, without the faintest attempt to involve the other parent, is not only unprofessional, it's downright irresponsible. Their actions flout basic principles and surpassing the boundaries of my understanding.

When Ackerman allows a very young child to be entered into counseling without showing that the person entering that child into therapy has sole custody, then something is very flawed at a very basic level.

originalText.text: Love the Ackerman institute, it has supported my family to create goals that benefit all of us, they provide a  collaborative effort to improve respect individually and  come together as a family to have a healthy relationship with each other.

originalText.text: I have attended a number of excellent workshops at ackerman. As a professional, I highly recommend their trainings.

text.text: I have attended a number of excellent workshops at ackerman. As a professional, I highly recommend their trainings.

originalText.text: Ackerman is an amazing training and clinical institute!
